Package inair.event

Contain all event classes

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnonymousHandler<ArgType>
    Anonymous Handler
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Delegate<ArgType>
    Class to manager delegate handler method
    Event<ArgType>
    The base class for all event classes.
    EventArgs
    The base class for all event argument classes.
    EventManager
    Allows management of RoutedEvents
    EventRoute
    Container for the route to be followed by a RoutedEvent when raised
    RoutedEvent
    RoutedEvent is a unique identifier for any registered RoutedEvent
    RoutedEventArgs
    The container for all state associated with a RoutedEvent
    RouteItem<T extends RoutedEventArgs>
    Copyright (c) 2014 SeeSpace.co.
    RoutingStrategy
    Routing Strategy can be either of Tunnel or Bubble
    SourceItem
    An item in the source context
